column4: I was wondering if somebody could help me answer a hardware related question?
I could buy the Samsung SM2343NW (here: http://www.ebuyer.com/product/158908) for £150
or I could buy the Dell SP2309W (here: http://www.overclockers.co.uk/showproduct.php?prodid=MO-031-DE) for £50 more
which one should I buy essentially?
both have provided similar specification but neither really informed me of their manufacturing process
most of the technology used in the televisions are of similar ability and technology, and so going by these minor dfferences isnt really useful
the manufacturing process is more important, but I cannot find any information on it
dynamic contrast ratio means pretty much nothing. static contrast ratio tells you a bit, but generally its a waste of time anyway. they are tested under "ideal conditions"
yeah... but DVI is better than VGA
